mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUBPANE (cp_code, cp_name, cp_content, cp_date, cp_pic, cp_rpic, cp_cnt, cp_likes, mc_code) VALUES(seq_clubpane.nextval, #{clubpane.cp_name}, #{clubpane.cp_content}, sysdate, #{clubpane.cp_pic}, #{clubpane.cp_rpic},0, 0, #{ memclub.mc_code })
mapper.select: SELECT p.CP_CODE, p.CP_NAME, p.CP_CONTENT, p.CP_DATE, p.CP_PIC, p.CP_CNT, p.CP_LIKES, p.MC_CODE, m.MEM_NAME, m.MEM_REALFNAME ,p.CP_RPIC, NVL(aaa.cnt,0) AS cnt FROM CLUBPANE p LEFT JOIN MEMCLUB c ON c.mc_CODE=p.MC_CODE LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON m.MEM_CODE = c.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT cp_code, count(*) AS cnt FROM clubpanelikes cl WHERE mem_code = ${member.mem_code} GROUP BY cp_code) aaa ON p.CP_CODE = aaa.cp_code WHERE CLUB_CODE = ${club.club_code} ORDER BY cp_code desc
mapper.update: UPDATE CLUBPANE SET CP_LIKES = CP_LIKES + 1 WHERE CP_CODE = #{cp_code}
mapper.select: SELECT CP_CODE, CP_NAME, CP_CONTENT, CP_DATE, CP_PIC, CP_CNT, CP_LIKES, MC_CODE FROM CLUBPANE WHERE CP_CODE = #{cp_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE CLUBPANE SET CP_LIKES = CP_LIKES - 1 WHERE CP_CODE = #{cp_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUBPANELIKES (CPLIKE_CODE, CP_CODE, MEM_CODE) VALUES (seq_clubpanelikes.nextval, ${clubpane.cp_code}, ${member.mem_code})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CLUBPANELIKES WHERE CP_CODE = ${clubpane.cp_code} AND MEM_CODE = ${member.mem_code}
mapper.select: SELECT CP_CODE FROM CLUBPANELIKES WHERE MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} ORDER BY cp_code desc
